nodes.text: Amick Mudd was a male Human who worked as an engineer on the space station Burnout during the time of the Clone Wars. He guarded a concealed staircase that lead into the depths of the station and when the Heroes of Cularin entered the engineering section of the station while in pursuit of the Trandoshan Xirossk, Mudd let them have access to the staircase after they stated the staircase's password.
